Product Info.Product Name: Wooden Spoon Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
Product Info.Description: Wooden Spoon® Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough will be your new favorite! Rich, semi-sweet chocolate drops are nestled in a bed of warm vanilla and sweet sugar. It’s sure to be the highlight of your day.
Product Info.Ingredients: Enriched Flour Bleached (Wheat Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Enzyme, Folic Acid), Sugar, Semisweet Chocolate Drops (Sugar, Chocolate, Cocoa Butter, Dextrose, Soy Lecithin, Natural & Artificial Flavor, Milk), Palm Oil, Water, Contains less than 2% of Eggs, Baking Soda, Molasses, Salt, Natural Flavor.
Product Info.Allergens: Contains: Egg, Milk, Soy, Wheat. Produced on the same line as products containing nuts. Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.
Product Info.Baking Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. 2. Break & place cookie dough cubes 2″ apart on a greased baking sheet. 3. Bake for 13–17 minutes, or until golden brown.
Product Info.Baking Tips: Bake from refrigerated or thawed state. Do not microwave frozen dough. Store unused dough in sealed container and freeze. Best if used within 6 weeks of delivery.
Product Info.Nutrition Facts: Calories: 120; Total Fat: 5g (7%) - Saturated Fat: 2.5g (13%), Trans Fat: 0g; Cholesterol: 10mg (3%); Sodium: 150mg (7%); Carbohydrates: 17g (6%) - Dietary Fiber: 1g (2%), Total Sugars: 10g (10g added sugars - 20%); Protein: 2g; Vitamin D: 0.1mcg (0%), Calcium: 10mg (0%), Iron: 0.7mg (4%), Potassium: 30mg (0%)

Product Info.Description: One bite will take you back to your childhood. This birthday cake-inspired cookie is full of colorful sprinkles and bursting with flavor. Perfect for every occasion!

Product Info.Baking Tips: Bake from refrigerated or thawed state. Do not microwave frozen dough. Store unused dough in sealed container and freeze. Best if used within 6 weeks of delivery.
Product Info.Nutrition Facts: Calories: 120; Total Fat: 5g (6%) - Saturated Fat: 2.5g (12%), Trans Fat: 0g; Cholesterol: 10mg (3%); Sodium: 130mg (6%); Carbohydrates: 17g (6%) - Dietary Fiber: 0g (1%), Total Sugars: 9g (9g added sugars - 18%); Protein: 1g; Vitamin D: 0.1mcg (0%), Calcium: 0mg (0%), Iron: 0.5mg (2%), Potassium: 10mg (0%)

Product Info.Product Name: Wooden Spoon Oatmeal Cranberry Cookie Dough
Product Info.Description: Taste and texture fanatics look no further! Hearty oatmeal, tangy cranberry bits, zesty citrus flavor, and sweet white chocolate flavor notes create a refreshing melody in your mouth.
Product Info.Ingredients: Oatmeal, Cranberries, Citrus Flavor, White Chocolate Flavor (detailed ingredients not provided, assumed from description).
Product Info.Allergens: Contains: Unknown (not listed). May contain allergens similar to other Wooden Spoon products. Produced on the same line as products containing nuts. Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.
Product Info.Baking Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. 2. Break & place cookie dough cubes 2″ apart on a greased baking sheet. 3. Bake for 13–17 minutes, or until golden brown.
Product Info.Baking Tips: Bake from refrigerated or thawed state. Do not microwave frozen dough. Store unused dough in sealed container and freeze. Best if used within 6 weeks of delivery.
Product Info.Nutrition Facts: Calories: 110; Total Fat: 4.5g (6%) - Saturated Fat: 2.5g (12%), Trans Fat: 0g; Cholesterol: 10mg (3%); Sodium: 125mg (5%); Carbohydrates: 16g (6%) - Dietary Fiber: 1g (2%), Total Sugars: 9g (9g added sugars - 18%); Protein: 1g; Vitamin D: 0.1mcg (0%), Calcium: 10mg (0%), Iron: 0.5mg (2%), Potassium: 20mg (0%)

Product Info.Product Name: Wooden Spoon Peanut Butter Cookie Dough
Product Info.Description: Decadent aroma fills the air! Consume the richness of real peanuts, ground to creamy perfection, combined with sugary sprinkles to satisfy your sweet desires.
Product Info.Ingredients: Sugar, Enriched Flour Bleached (Wheat Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Enzyme, Folic Acid), Peanut Butter (Peanuts, Dextrose, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oils [Cottonseed, Rapeseed], Salt), Palm Oil, Water, Molasses, Contains less than 2% of Eggs, Baking Soda, Salt.
Product Info.Allergens: Contains: Egg, Peanut, Wheat. Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.
Product Info.Baking Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. 2. Break & place cookie dough cubes 2″ apart on a greased baking sheet. 3. Tip: Roll each cube in sugar and flatten with a fork making a crisscross pattern. 4. Bake for 13–17 minutes, or until golden brown.
Product Info.Baking Tips: Bake from refrigerated or thawed state. Do not microwave frozen dough. Store unused dough in sealed container and freeze. Best if used within 6 weeks of delivery.
Product Info.Nutrition Facts: Calories: 130; Total Fat: 7g (9%) - Saturated Fat: 2.5g (13%), Trans Fat: 0g; Cholesterol: 5mg (2%); Sodium: 125mg (6%); Carbohydrates: 16g (6%) - Dietary Fiber: 1g (2%), Total Sugars: 10g (9g added sugars - 19%); Protein: 2g; Vitamin D: 0.1mcg (0%), Calcium: 10mg (0%), Iron: 0.5mg (2%), Potassium: 50mg (2%)

Product Info.Product Name: Wooden Spoon Triple Chocolate Cookie Dough
Product Info.Description: Calling all chocolate lovers! Rich Dutch cocoa powder combines with white chips and semi-sweet chocolate chips in this sweet indulgence that’s sure to gratify any chocolate craving.
Product Info.Ingredients: Enriched Flour Bleached (Wheat Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Enzyme, Folic Acid), Sugar, Palm Oil, Water, White Drops (Sugar, Palm Kernel and Palm Oil, Whey, Nonfat Milk, Dextrose, Soy Lecithin, Salt, Natural Flavor), Semisweet Chocolate Drops (Sugar, Chocolate, Cocoa Butter, Dextrose, Soy Lecithin, Natural & Artificial Flavor, Milk), Cocoa processed with Alkali, Eggs, Contains less than 2% of Baking Soda, Natural Flavor, Salt.
Product Info.Allergens: Contains: Egg, Milk, Soy, Wheat. Produced on the same line as products containing nuts. Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.
Product Info.Baking Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. 2. Break & place cookie dough cubes 2″ apart on a greased baking sheet. 3. Bake for 13–15 minutes, or until edges are slightly crisp. Don’t overbake.
Product Info.Baking Tips: Bake from refrigerated or thawed state. Do not microwave frozen dough. Store unused dough in sealed container and freeze. Best if used within 6 weeks of delivery.
Product Info.Nutrition Facts: Calories: 120; Total Fat: 5g (7%) - Saturated Fat: 3g (14%), Trans Fat: 0g; Cholesterol: 15mg (4%); Sodium: 140mg (6%); Carbohydrates: 17g (6%) - Dietary Fiber: 1g (2%), Total Sugars: 10g (10g added sugars - 20%); Protein: 2g; Vitamin D: 0.1mcg (0%), Calcium: 10mg (0%), Iron: 0.9mg (4%), Potassium: 60mg (2%)

Product Info.Baking Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325°F. 2. Break & place cookie dough cubes 2″ apart on a greased baking sheet. 3. Bake for 13–17 minutes, or until golden brown.
Product Info.Baking Tips: Bake from refrigerated or thawed state. Do not microwave frozen dough. Store unused dough in sealed container and freeze. Best if used within 6 weeks of delivery.
Product Info.Nutrition Facts: Calories: 130; Total Fat: 6g (7%) - Saturated Fat: 3g (14%), Trans Fat: 0g; Cholesterol: 0mg (1%); Sodium: 115mg (5%); Carbohydrates: 17g (6%) - Dietary Fiber: <1g (1%), Total Sugars: 11g (11g added sugars - 22%); Protein: 1g; Vitamin D: 0.1mcg (0%), Calcium: 10mg (0%), Iron: 0.4mg (2%), Potassium: 20mg (0%)

FAQs.Question: How do I obtain allergen information about your products?
FAQs.Answer: Specific ingredients vary by product and flavor. All major food allergens contained in Wooden Spoon® products are listed on the back of each package under the ingredient list. Allergens are also listed under the product page of each flavor. Although strict policies are in place to prevent cross contamination, products are made in a facility that processes tree nut and peanut products.

FAQs.Question: Where can I find nutritional data or ingredient lists for a product?
FAQs.Answer: Always refer to the package for the most accurate information. You can also view nutritional info on the Wooden Spoon website under each flavor's page.

FAQs.Question: Does Wooden Spoon® Cookie Dough contain bioengineered ingredients?
FAQs.Answer: Yes. See the USDA’s bioengineered food fact sheet for more info.

FAQs.Question: Is Wooden Spoon Cookie Dough sold in retail stores?
FAQs.Answer: No. Wooden Spoon products are only available through fundraisers.

FAQs.Question: How can I buy more Wooden Spoon products?
FAQs.Answer: You can participate in an ongoing fundraiser in your area.

FAQs.Question: How should I store my cookie dough?
FAQs.Answer: Keep frozen until ready to use.

FAQs.Question: How should I bake my cookie dough?
FAQs.Answer: Refer to the package or visit the product page online for detailed baking instructions.
